name: Jelly Puzzle Popper Free Fun Chain Reaction Strategy Skill Game
name_original: Jelly Puzzle Popper Free Fun Chain Reaction Strategy Skill Game
description:
Get ready to have some jelly popping fun in this new puzzle adventure! Completely FREE to play! 300 addicting and challenging levels will keep you playing for days! This strategy based game is quick and easy to learn, but hard to master as the levels get harder.

=========
HOW TO PLAY
=========
Pop all the jelly colors in the least number of touches to clear the level. When a color is popped it will help you with a chain reaction to the other colors above, below, and to the left and right of the jelly.
=========

Fun Jelly Puzzle Features:
● 300 levels!!! 
● Game Center leaderboards - challenge your Friends! 
● Hints to help you when you get stuck!
● Fun jelly graphics
● Simple to learn, but hard to master as the levels get higher 

Completely FREE! Get this game today!
